title: Polchinski equation, reparameterization invariance and the derivative expansion
abstract: The connection between the anomalous dimension and some invariance properties of the fixed point actions within exact RG is explored. As an application, Polchinski equation at next-to-leading order in the derivative expansion is studied. For the Wilson fixed point of the one-component scalar theory in three dimensions we obtain the critical exponents \eta=0.042, \nu=0.622 and \omega=0.754.
